name: WILDLOTUS荒原幻想
description:
This work is a secondary creative game work with the theme of Oriental project.

Farm, build houses, have plenty of food and clothing, and make friends.

Mining, copper and iron smelting, upgrading tools and developing science and technology.

Fight, subdue the goblins, form your own goblins army, travel north and south, and level the fantasy village!

You don't play any role in fantasy village, but you can also play all roles!
